children.text: The render has been applied across the movement/control joints, which will likely result in cracking.
The Victorian Building Authority’s Guide to Standards and Tolerances clause 9.07 Covering movement control joints and damp-proof courses, states that
‘render or other applied finishes are defective if they cover movement control joints’ .
The render from within the control joint will need to be removed and replaced with a flexible mastic sealant or similar to ensure the joint can move as intended.
